basics.name: Susanne Agular
basics.label: Architect
basics.summary: I a full stack is a developer who loves working with new technology. I work best in planning the architecture of applications and their development life. I also love to work with new frameworks.

references.reference: I worked with Susanne for several years and during that time always found Susanne to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. He is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. When asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Susanne delivered without hesitation and with excellent execution, even if the projects were outside of his immediate role. I would highly recommend Susanne for his positive character as a member of any creative team.
